articles.author: Morgan Meaker
articles.title: More Penguins Than Europeans Can Use Google Bard - WIRED
articles.description: Nobody in the EU can access Google’s Bard chatbot. But the 50,000 penguins who live on a dormant volcano in the South Atlantic can sign up right now.
articles.content: The blocs omission hints at the larger power struggle between regulators and Big Tech in Europe. At a minimum, the search giant needs more time to compare Bard with the EUs draft AI Act, says Henk va… [+3714 chars]
